title: Glitter Gulch Mine
description: Meet your new best friend, Canary Mary.

general.name: GGM Early (Any%)
general.description: GGM can be entered before completing Jiggywiggy's puzzle via a precise beak bust between the wooden frame and the grate that blocks the level off. This is the Any% variant.

general.name: GGM Early (100%)
general.description: GGM can be entered before completing Jiggywiggy's puzzle via a precise beak bust between the wooden frame and the grate that blocks the level off. This is the 100% variant.

general.name: Detonator Levitation
general.description: Collects the jiggy behind the waterfall using the detonator. A well-timed A then B press while swimming against a sloped wall will push the detonator down and, as the detonator causes damage to itself, will float up high enough to collect the jiggy without the need for springy step shoes.

general.name: Generator Cavern (Ladder Jump)
general.description: Skips navigating the generator cavern by backflipping onto the ladder.

general.name: Ordnance Storage Route
general.description: How to navigate the Ordnance Storage minigame.

cwkshots.name: Jail Jinjo Clockwork Shot
cwkshots.description: This clockwork shot quickly collects the jailed jinjo by shooting through a small opening in the jail cell.

cwkshots.name: Water Storage Tub Jinjo Shot (Any% No DCW)
cwkshots.description: Clockwork shot used to collect the water storage jinjo in Any% No DCW.

cwkshots.name: Water Storage Tub Jinjo Shot (100%)
cwkshots.description: Clockwork shot used to collect the water storage jinjo in 100%.

cwkshots.name: Generator Cavern (Clockwork Shot)
cwkshots.description: Collects generator cavern jiggy with a well-placed clockwork shot from below.
